Tables.​ADC_APEX_ACTION_ITEMS

Table to store initial references between page items and apex actions

Fields
caai_caa_id

Part of PK, Refrence to ADC_APEX_ACTION

caai_cpi_crg_id

Part of PK, Refrence to ADC_PAGE_ITEM

caai_cpi_id

Part of PK, Refrence to ADC_PAGE_ITEM

caai_active

Flag to indicate whether page item shall be connected with this action initially
